What is a fork of Augur?

Some people call it Augur’s last resort, some call it a nuclear weapon, some call it what they are waiting for, and some call it what they never want to be happened… what in the world is a fork?

The purpose of this section is to get a good understanding of a fork and prepare for it.

The contents are:

  • Basic knowledge
  • To-do’s
  • Restrictions on use
  • Migration of the objects

If you are a biginner, you should start with basic knowledge. If you are a REP holder, you must read to-do’s to not lose the value of your REP. And if you want to do a deep dive into a fork, check restrictions on use and migration of the objects.
